attributes.review: I got this app thinking it was for Cheetos, but when I opened the app there was nothing about Cheetos! They just put some pics of Cheetos, and only cheese Cheetos. This is false advertising and should be removed at once! This made me sick of Cheetos and now I’m vegan.
attributes.title: My poor eyes

attributes.review: to start i opened the app and there was a spinny thing🔁like he’s trying to hypnotize me or something 😿it flew all the way to my house and kidnapped my fish😞it made me pay 10,000 to get it back 😔then the app sent someone😈 to take the fish’s water😭uh chile anyways... the photo of the cheeto🍤 gave me nightmares😖why would someone allow such a horrific 🤢thing to be posted 🤮this app shows very traumatizing photos😷 and i had to sit there and see them👁👄👁
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: This app supports a rapist, homophobic, sexist, and RACIST man. I don’t support anyone or anything that supports him. Not only does this have disturbing images of his face but it also lies! It says “making America great” I don’t see how the president is doing that at all. Disgusting, disappointing, disgraceful app.
attributes.title: WORST APP!!!

attributes.review: Bold and thrash?? Not like BELONGS IN THE TRASH! App continues to crash constantly when I try to see my fav Cheeto. I tried putting it In the microwave, I’ve tried petting my cat, I even tried on a couple of wigs but nothing works. Idk who thought this was acceptable but it’s not.
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: First of all I only downloaded this app to rate it so this app can be gone and the thing is that Trump is horrible person Apple please take this app down because I still don’t understand why you still let this racist orange Cheetos have a app like this
attributes.title: ZERO STARS!!!!#GENZ#BLM#ABOLISHICE

attributes.review: this app is TERRIBLE!! and i’m not even a liberal or a leftist😹😹 when i opened the app it smelt SO BAD🤢 and then when i kept it open, i didn’t realize my grandma was sitting next to me so it KILLED HER- that’s how bad it is. please don’t download this app for ur own safety🙏🏽🙏🏽
attributes.title: it killed my grandma :((

attributes.review: It completely ruined my phone. After downloading this app trump believed i was one of his ✌️ I began getting home visits and trump mail. I also got samples of cheeto dust all over my mailbox. Idk if he’s delivering the mail but it sure seems like it 😔
attributes.title: Terrible DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: Idk why a man like trump can make such an app. He’s disgusting and it’s so disappointment to see this man as our number one “leaders” as he calls him self 🤢 this man deserves nothing he’s disgusting idk how many times I could say it. He should be in jail!!!
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: Worst app I’ve ever had.  Gave my phone a virus, it glitches & crashes all the time AND I don’t know what kind of black magic they used to make this app but now I’m blind in my right eye just from looking at it 😡
attributes.title: Is this a joke?

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to find useful information about, and then realized the glitches just, so when I asked for support they, and now I’m ready to delete the app. 
Thanks for wasting our time. 👁👄👁
